com.gonzalo

Class HolidayPackagesServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.gonzalo.HolidayPackagesServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(name="hpServlet",
            urlPatterns="/holidaypackages/*")
public class HolidayPackagesServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    This class holds every response to petitions for HolidayPackages, implementing basic CRUD methods
    Author:
    Gonzalo Luque
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
